Provide a detailed summary of the trained ESN model

Source: R/methods-base.R
summary.esn.Rd

Provide a detailed summary of the trained ESN model.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'esn'
summary(object, ...)

Arguments

object

An object of class esn. The result of a call to train_esn().

...

Currently not in use.

Value

Print detailed model summary.

See also

Other base functions: forecast_esn(), is.esn(), is.forecast_esn(), is.tune_esn(), plot.esn(), plot.forecast_esn(), plot.tune_esn(), print.esn(), summary.tune_esn(), train_esn(), tune_esn()

Examples

xdata <- as.numeric(AirPassengers)
xmodel <- train_esn(y = xdata)
summary(xmodel)
#> 
#> --- Inputs -----------------------------------------------------
#> n_obs        = 144
#> n_diff       = 1
#> lags         = 1
#> 
#> --- Reservoir generation ---------------------------------------
#> n_states     = 57
#> alpha        = 1
#> rho          = 1
#> density      = 0.5
#> scale_inputs = [-0.5, 0.5]
#> scale_win    = [-0.5, 0.5]
#> scale_wres   = [-0.5, 0.5]
#> 
#> --- Model selection --------------------------------------------
#> n_models     = 114
#> df           = 16.68
#> lambda       = 0.0457
